subject: Re: Idle threats from a coward

full_text:
I appreciate the advice, Frank. 

I'll do so, at least initially. Perhaps it's so some sort of lock-on 
with those on the otherside can be established. From my ITC reading, 
there is something of a challange to ITC due to unsynchronized 
difference of time and space between hither and yon. 

Perhaps leaving a Box on and running in one location improves the 
chances by allow those using their tech on the otherside to establish 
a better connection.

For some silly reason I was just reminded of a scene from an old 
classic, The Time Tunnel. I visualized again those white coated 
scientists in the control room, using the big machine to scan across 
the vastness, trying to get a stable lock on Doug and Tony... lost in 
time!

Lance
